data.eml:eml: The discovery of the genus Caecina Stål (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Ectrichodiinae) from China, with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cui, Jianxin, Li, Hu, Cai, Wanzhi (2008): The discovery of the genus Caecina Stål (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Ectrichodiinae) from China, with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 1727: 44-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181246
